Package ohos.utils.system

Class SystemCapability.Aafwk

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.utils.system.SystemCapability.Aafwk
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemCapability

    public static class SystemCapability.Aafwk
extends Object
    Defines system capabilities provided by the ability framework.
    Since:
    5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String ABILITY
      Indicates the essential component of applications, ability, which is an abstraction of a functionality that an application can provide.
      static String ABILITYJET
      Provides the data binding capability, allowing you to bind data to UI components using a declarative format instead of in a programmatic manner.
      static String INTENT
      Indicates the carrier for transferring information within an application or between applications.
